alert.note: Alert for Craig; Nowata (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 1:33AM CDT until April 30 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Nowata County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 133 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Lenapah, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... South Coffeyville... Delaware... Lenapah... Hollow... Centralia... Centrailia... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
